text: Need Sage Reed for Coles campaign. Budget around $4,199, looking for 3 x Podcast guest, 1 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Pinterest pin, 3 x TikTok video, 2 x YouTube video. 8 week exclusivity from other grocery brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
